DOC.brief_summary: This Phase I , single-center , three-arm , randomize , double-blind , active- placebo-controlled study investigate effect GDC-0449 QT/QTc interval healthy female subject non-childbearing potential .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Investigate Effect GDC-0449 QT/QTc Interval Healthy Female Subjects
DOC.criteria: Female , 45 year age In good health , determine absence clinically significant finding screen visit Body mass index 18 32 kg/m^2 inclusive , body weight > 45 kg Of nonchildbearing potential History clinically significant gastrointestinal , renal , hepatic , bronchopulmonary , neurological , psychiatric , cardiac , vascular , endocrinological , hematological , allergic disease ; metabolic disorder ; cancer ; cirrhosis Allergy moxifloxacin quinolone antibiotic confirm significant allergic reaction drug , multiple allergy judgment investigator Personal family history congenital long QT syndrome family history sudden death Participation investigational drug device study investigational drug within last 3 month six time elimination halflife , whichever longer , prior Day 1 study
